text: Melibe viridis is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Tethydidae.Gofas, S. (2012). Melibe viridis (Kelaart, 1858). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=181237 on 2012-10-12 ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Mediterranean Sea, the Red Sea, off Mozambique and off Indonesia. ==Description== The body reaches a length of 140 mm. ==References== * MacNae, W. & M.
